title: Wonton Soup with Greens
description: Light, soothing broth with tender pork-and-shrimp wontons and bright leafy greens. Quick to assemble and simmered briefly for delicate flavors with ginger, soy, and sesame oil notes.

ingredients.display_name: raw shrimp, peeled deveined and chopped
bok choy, trimmed and sliced (or napa cabbage)
ingredients.notes: about 2 small heads or a large bunch
can use vegetable broth for pescatarian

ingredients.display_name: scallions (green onions), sliced (white and green separated)
ingredients.notes: whites for filling/broth, greens for garnish
2 tbsp for filling, 1 tbsp for broth
adjust to taste; low-sodium broth may need more

ingredients.display_name: white pepper or black pepper, ground
optional chili oil or sliced chili
ingredients.notes: for serving if extra heat desired

steps.text: Prepare filling: finely chop shrimp and place in a bowl with ground pork, grated ginger, half the minced garlic, whites of scallions finely sliced, soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, beaten egg, salt, and pepper; mix until sticky and well combined.

Assemble wontons: place a wonton wrapper on a dry surface, put about 1 teaspoon of filling in center, wet wrapper edges with water, fold into triangle or purse shape sealing tightly to avoid air pockets; repeat until all filling or wrappers are used.
Bring broth to a simmer in a large pot with remaining garlic, 1 tbsp soy sauce, and a small piece of ginger; adjust heat so broth is gently simmering (not rolling).

Cook wontons: drop assembled wontons into simmering broth in batches if necessary; simmer gently for 4-5 minutes until wrappers are translucent and filling is cooked through (internal temperature for pork reaches safe temp).
Add greens: stir in sliced bok choy or napa cabbage and cook for 1-2 minutes until bright and tender-crisp; taste and adjust seasoning with salt, white pepper, or more soy sauce.
Finish and serve: ladle wontons and broth into bowls, garnish with sliced scallion greens, drizzle a few drops of sesame oil and optional chili oil, and serve immediately.
